Name: A Lingering Flavor
Effect: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of Signature Mix end.

Name: Shaken, Not Purred
Effect: Increases Icy Paws' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%.Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the Icy Paws shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

Name: A-Another Round?
Effect: Increases the Level of Signature Mix by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Name: Wine Industry Slayer
Effect: Within the radius of Signature Mix, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%

Name: Double Shot, On The Rocks
Effect: Increases the Level of Icy Paws by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Name: Cat's Tail Closing Time
Effect: Characters within Signature Mix's radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.
